zachary.shapes

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • zachary.shapes.Shape
      • zachary.shapes.RegularPolygon

  • public class RegularPolygon
extends Shape
    This class represents a double precision Polygon, that draws a polygon and can calculate basic math about it
    Version:
    10/22/18
    Author:
    Zachary Wang

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class zachary.shapes.Shape

        x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Creates a default instance of a RegularPolygon object with all dimensions set to zero.
      RegularPolygon(double x, double y, int numSides, double sideLength)
      Creates a default instance of a RegularPolygon object with a center point x, y, a side length, and a certain number of sides

        public RegularPolygon()

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(int numSides,
                      double sideLength)

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(double x,
                      double y,
                      int numSides,
                      double sideLength)
        Creates a default instance of a RegularPolygon object with a center point x, y, a side length, and a certain number of sides
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the RegularPolygon
        y - y coordinate of the RegularPolygon
        numSides - number of sides of the RegularPolygon
        sideLength - side length of the RegularPolygon
        Precondition:
        numSides has to be more than 2
